Text: The Christmas Invasion is not part of season 3, it was the preview episode of SEASON 2.
Oops, your right, I meant The Runaway Bride.
Dude, you listed both of them as part of season 3.

I included the Runaway bride as part of season 3 to make a complete set of all the episodes. The BBC did release The Runaway Bride as a separate DVD but did you really want to burn a dvd, print labels, etc. for just one episode?

Cover and DVD label has been uploaded to Cdcover.cc

Here is the link:
http://www.cdcovers.cc/view/277248/front/doctor-who-season-3-volume-1-r1-custom

Has anybody found the easter egg yet?
Does anybody care?
Do you want more like this on a future release?
